明曜科技致力於提供儲能、工控設備及E-bike電源管理解決方案，能提供完整的MI: Etica is a professional provider of total solutions on ESS, handheld device batteries and LEV batteries.
電力交易平台為台電依電業法所設置，同時推動日前輔助服務市場與備用容量市場。日前輔: The Energy Trading Platform (ETP) is established by Taiwan Power Company in accordance with the Electricity Act, including the day-ahead ancillary service market and electricity reserve capacity market. The day-ahead ancillary service market helps incorporate more flexible and diverse resources that can respond quickly into the power system to maintain the overall stability of the power grid. The electricity reserve capacity market facilitates electricity generating and retailing enterprises in procuring the legally required electricity reserve capacity to avoid overload. The day-ahead ancillary service market products are divided into frequency regulation reserve (sReg, dReg), E-dReg, real-time reserve, and supplementary reserve. Energy storage systems mostly participate in the form of frequency regulation reserve or E-dReg.
明曜以獨家技術研發+C20呎貨櫃儲能系統，以一半面積達成傳統40呎儲能櫃的儲存容: Etica has developed the +C 20-foot ESS container with its exclusive technology, which matches the storage capacity of a traditional 40-foot container with only half the area. In addition, Etica has +O outdoor ESS cabinet that is suitable for small and medium-sized projects. Both are equipped with advanced cooling and fire-fighting technology to make them safer.
電動車因近年電池安全性提升、生產技術成熟加上價格漸趨親民，成為用路人的新寵。20: In recent years, electric vehicles have become increasingly popular among drivers due to the improvement in battery safety, mature production technology, and more affordable prices. Despite the slowdown in the Taiwan automobile market in 2022, sales of electric vehicles have more than doubled to 16,120 units, accounting for 3.75% of total vehicle sales. The introduction of electric vehicles has driven the widespread deployment of charging stations. Among them, fast charging stations can output the required electricity for long-distance travel in just tens of minutes. Combined with energy storage equipment, it can increase the service capacity and thus the income of charging station owners. They are often installed in outdoor locations such as public parking lots.
明曜的儲能系統具耐高壓與防延燒等設計，亦可依其需求再與其他rack並聯以提升其容: Etica's ESS is designed to withstand high voltage and prevent fire propagation. It can also be paralleled to increase the capacity based on customer needs, and enables fast charging stations to charge multiple electric vehicles at the same time, suitable for shopping malls and parking lot service providers.
家用儲能適用於家庭、電力不足或不穩定的郊區、不可斷電的儀器或設備。當電源充足時，: Home energy storage system is designed for households, suburban areas with unstable power supply, and equipment or devices that cannot be disconnected from the power source. The ESS will be fully charged when the power supply is sufficient, and the stored power would be converted into AC power for household appliances or heavy machinery when there is a power outage. In recent years, newly completed residential buildings have replaced traditional diesel generators or lead-acid batteries, which have lower energy density and cause air pollution, with ESS as emergency power supply equipment.
明曜的家用儲能系統+R系列設計二種規格：10kWh及20kWh，可結合太陽能發電: Etica's home ESS products, +R, are designed in two specifications: 10kWh and 20kWh, which can be combined with solar power generation equipment.
工廠用電首重穩定，電壓不足或突然斷電都可能造成設備損壞或產品報銷。另外，台灣為加: Stability is crucial for industrial power supply as voltage drops or sudden power outages can lead to equipment damage or product write-offs. Moreover, in order to achieve net zero carbon emissions at an accelerated pace, Taiwanese government requires high electricity users with contracted capacities exceeding 5,000K watts to establish renewable energy power generation facilities or ESS with rated power of at least 10% of their contracted capacity before 2025. Early adopters will be granted discount on the obligatory capacity. The installation of ESS in factories contributes to electricity cost saving, stabler power supply, and energy consumption control. The ESS can also participate in the Energy Trading Platform to obtain additional revenue.
明曜的儲能系統產品線完整，可因應現場環境、客戶需求、法規限制提供適合的產品及整體: Etica offers complete ESS product lines that comprise total solution based on the on-site environment, customer requirements, and regulatory restrictions.
全球減碳浪潮（RE100、SBTi科學基礎減碳目標、歐洲碳關稅等）及台灣停用核電: Driven by the global decarbonization trend (RE100, SBTi, carbon tariffs, etc.) and Taiwan's policy of phasing out nuclear power, renewable electricity generation, with solar and wind power as the main sources, is gradually receiving more attention from all parties. Renewable energy accounts for about 8.6% of Taiwan's total electricity generation sources in 2022, which is only slightly lower than nuclear power, and its importance to the overall power grid is increasing. The long-term development of renewable electricity generation has been limited by the instability caused by natural environmental changes, which may impact the traditional power system considering the impact of bidirectional power flow on power quality and system protection and that of the rapid changes in renewable energy output on the overall power supply-demand balance, posing a challenge to system dispatching.
太陽能電板搭配儲能系統一併規劃已蔚為趨勢，明曜的儲能系統規格多元，且能與光電模組: It has become a trend to construct solar power plant with ESS. Etica’s ESS has a variety of specifications and can be perfectly combined with photovoltaic modules.

輕型電動載具種類繁多，其中電動自行車的全球市場在歐洲人熱衷戶外運動的風潮中蓬勃發: Among all kinds of the lighting electric vehicle (LEV), the global market for electric bicycles (e-bikes) is booming amid the enthusiasm for outdoor sports, and Taiwanese manufacturers play a pivotal role in the supply chain. 儲能設備在建置完成運轉後才是挑戰的開始。除了電池自然老化，外部環境的粉塵、鹽害等: The challenge begins after the ESS is put into operation. In addition to the natural aging of batteries, dust and salt damage will also cause the ESS to fail to operate efficiently, seriously affecting the stability and safety of electricity supply. In order to improve the life and safety of equipment, operation and maintenance (O&M) is indispensable.ETICA‘s ESS with our monitoring system enables easy access to the live system status and historical data, which helps debugging when any problems occur. The scope of O&M covers water cooling system, fire protection system and battery cabinet.
明曜的儲能設備可搭配智能維運監測系統，在運作過程有任何問題發生時，可於第一時間由: Etica's energy storage systems can be integrated with intelligent operation and maintenance monitoring systems. In the event of any issues during operation, users can remotely access the system via the internet to check its status and review log history data in real-time. This feature enables prompt troubleshooting of any abnormal situations. The scope of maintenance covers water cooling systems, fire protection systems, and battery cabinets.
